name: Rogue Money
description:
This game is made for Ludum Dare 44.

Rogue Money is a rogue-like action game where you shoot coins at enemies to get a larger amount of money. Some enemies have resistance against low price coins so you need to carefully choose which coin to use. When you run out of money, the game is over.

Controls and rules:

  • Use the arrow keys to move.
  • Press X to shoot a coin.
  • Enemies drop money when you shoot them.
  • You can carry 10 coins at a time.
  • Beating stronger enemies requires higher prices.
  • Pay attention to the remaining time. When the time is up, the Tax Collector Big Hand (TCBH) starts chasing you:)

We are a team of three Japanese who are working together in a game company. As a job, we make large-scale games in a large team, but we are lately interested in making a small game in a small team so we got together in a holiday and made this game for Ludum Dare. We hope you will enjoy the game!
